Now, the full Fortran code:

program combined

   implicit none

   integer :: n, d, i, a, result, m
   integer(8) :: position, nrstSeqStartIndx, startIndex, final_result
   integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: nums

   ! First program's input
   read *, n, d
   allocate(nums(n))
   read *, nums

   ! First program's processing
   result = 0
   do i = 2, n
      a = nums(i-1) - nums(i) if (a >= 0) then
         result = result + (a / d) + 1
         nums(i) = nums(i) + ( (a / d) + 1 ) *

      end if
   end do

   ! Second program's processing (X is result)
   m = result
   do i = result -1, 1, -1
      if (mod(m, i) == 0) then
         m = i
      end if
   end do

   ! Third program's processing (position is result)
   position = result
   nrstSeqStartIndx = 1

   ! First loop to find the starting index
   do
      integer(8) :: tempIndex, val
      tempIndex = nrstSeqStartIndx * 2
      val = 1 + (tempIndex - 1)*tempIndex / 2
      if (val >= position) exit
      nrstSeqStartIndx = tempIndex
   end do

   ! Second loop to find the exact index
   do
      integer(8) :: tempIndex, val
      tempIndex = nrstSeqStartIndx + 1
      val = 1 + (tempIndex - 1)*tempIndex /2
      if (val > position) exit
      nrstSeqStartIndx = tempIndex
   end do

   startIndex = 1 + (nrstSeqStartIndx -1)*nrstSeqStartIndx /2 final_result = (position - startIndex) + 1

   print *, final_result

end program combined

   integer :: n, d, i, a, result, m
   integer(8) :: position, nrstSeqStartIndx, startIndex, final_result

         nums(i) = nums(i) + ( (a / d) + 1 ) * d

   nrstSeqStartIndx = 1

      tempIndex = nrstSeqStartIndx * 2
      val = 1 + (tempIndex - 1)*tempIndex / 2

   end do

   final_result = (position - startIndex) + 1

end program combined
